data.comment: The match has started, with Reading kicking-off.
Vladan Ivic (Watford) is making a first substitution, with Ken Sema replacing Tom Dele-Bashiru.
In the minute 38, Josh Laurent (Reading) has received a yellow card from Gavin Ward.
Ben Wilmot is booked for the away team.
Goal! George Puscas gives Reading a 1-0 lead in Reading.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
It's Watford with the kick-off after the break.
The home team replace Michael Olise with Tom McIntyre.
In the minute 62, At Madejski Stadium, Omar Richards has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Tom Cleverley is replacing Kiko Femenia for Watford at Madejski Stadium.
Watford make their third substitution with Glenn Murray replacing Ismaila Sarr.
In the minute 84, Veljko Paunovic is making the team's second substitution at Madejski Stadium with Dejan Tetek replacing Sone Aluko.
Watford's Joao Pedro has been booked in Reading.
Dejan Tetek (Reading) has received a first yellow card.
The match has come to a close in Reading. The final score is 1-0.
Nathaniel Chalobah (Watford) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
